subject: 10/20 Order for Silver Baseplate
description_text:
Hi there,

I placed an order on 10/20 for the Silver Base-plate
(https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pedal-pro-plus-with-baseplate?variant=50475291476282)
and paid $90.90 after tax and shipping on my Amex (via ApplePay).

I did not receive a confirmation email from Shop.com nor Simsonn.com
and am unable to see the order placed on either website using my email
address, pkrengel26@gmail.com.


Please confirm the order exists, re-instantiate it in the system, or
refund me ASAP.  I'd prefer to not need to contact my credit card
company regarding this issue.

Thank you,
Peter

PS: I am aware that there was a massive AWS outage on Monday which
could be related, I am very interested in receiving the product but am
worried about the payment with missing order.
